segments.text: Excuse me . I think I have got lost in the Art Gallery . Can you tell me the way to the exit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Go back and take the third turning on the left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . I have been wondering here for almost half an hour .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is really like a labyrinth .
segments.speaker: S2
